column5: Does anybody know why Musky Hunter and Next Bite are not on WFN anymore ?
I thhink Musky Hunter is still on, its just late friday nights whn it airs
I was wondering the same thing Jim, I always liked  MuskyHunter but haven't seen it in quite awhile.
well that explains why my pvr hasn't recorded those 2 shows lately...i like them...and the next bite may be my favorite fishing show
I love both shows , especially next bite and the way they describe the rigging and presentation of baits.
Those are both very well done shows and I was wondering the same, but my favourites are propably The new fly fisher and facts of fishing and fishn canada
Hmmm...so it wasn't just me.  Definitly a loss if they are not on anymore.
yes sir, very good programming

maybe the seasons over for them, perhaps the network only gave them a certain number of shows for this season. not sure how it works but that could be a good possibility. i love both shows aswell, and im pretty sure many others enjoy them aswell so i doubt they've been canceled.

Both shows are still listed on the website but come up as "no episodes this week". I would assume if they were dropped by the network they would be nowhere to be found on wfn.tv.  I have to guess they will be back once some new episodes are in the can.
I hope Alexcba is right..  Two great shows for sure.  I can only take so much bass fishing eh.

Yeah I think they were both in their 3rd rotation of reruns for this season.  New ones come out just after the new year or so.  I hope this is the case, and I hope the return to the Monster Fish Thursday time slot fits my schedule perfect.
Ya not much of a reason to watch...and I get "bassed" out pretty quick.  Time for some fresh ideas fellas/ladies.  I think I could watch April Vokey on Fly Max forever

I don't get either one of them down here unless they air them on Versus I still have a bitter taste in my crawl after EA took a three year membership fee from me and never sent me a a refund or even a letter as to why they felt the need to take my money and close down shop
HAHA I could watch mariko izumi forever
I see you have never seen those 2 shows the only time you will see bass is if they are using them for bait.....
I have no problem with bass just it's very....repetitive and they're all pretty well the same size, now muskie and pike and the odd walleye from cronzy, thats enjoyable
You can watch all of seasons 1-5 of the next bite online here: http://www.thenextbite.com/node/14472  Lots of great episodes.
thanks
I'm with Tommy! Mariko all the way! In the tropical locations though, as she always had the bikini on!lol
